attributes.action: BBC to become a subscription service eg no licence Licence becoming competitive
attributes.additional_details:
Debate this in Parliament in order to stop the licence fee that millions of people do not pay and get away with it at the moment.
Rule that the BBC channels becoming subscription meaning that if a person wants to watch it they must subscribe
attributes.background: Bring the BBC into the competitive TV market along with all other channels which do not require a licence to view. Also those that get away with not paying will have to pay via subscription like everyone else who wants to watch it
